{{ titre }}

{{ article.titre }}

Par {{ article.author }} - {{ article.date | date }}

{{ article.content }}

import { Component } from '@angular/core'; @Component({ selector: 'app-articles', templateUrl: './articles.component.html', styleUrls: ['./articles.component.css'] }) export class ArticlesComponent { titre = 'Les articles du jour'; listeArticles!: ArticlesComponent[]; ngOnInit(){ this.listeArticles=[ {titre: '', contenu:'', auteur: '', date: '', class name { constructor(parameters) { } }: 0}, {id: 2, title: "T-shirt 2", price: 21, quantity: 10, like: 0}, {id: 3, title: "T-shirt 3", price: 16, quantity: 8, like: 0} ]; } }
